We sign this petition because we currently have NO confidence in policing in the UK.

We have the death of Ian Tomlinson who was shoved by a police officer and then died.

We have the Police cover up of the Hillsborough disaster.

The polices kettling of demonstrators in peaceful protest.

The Police constant propaganda which we all believe is untrue that crime is reducing when for various reasons, crime is not recorded because of a lack of confidence in them.

Following the "Stephen Lawrence Enquiry" and the progress that was made, we note the unfortunate reverse in this progress on equality in policing.

Many people all over the UK have been victims of crime and have been disatisfied by the polices actions in their treatment.

This petition is an opportunity for those that want an improved policing service to say they are not happy with policing in our country.
